poses.title: Classic Saree Drape
poses.alt: Woman in elegant saree posing with classic drape, one hand on hip, gentle smile
steps: Stand straight with your feet slightly apart
Drape the saree pallu elegantly over your shoulder

Turn your body slightly to create a flattering angle
Look directly at the camera with a soft smile

bodyLanguage.angle: Slight 45-degree turn to the camera is most flattering

Keep your arms moving dynamically

Hold ropes in both hands and move them in waves

Tilt your shaker bottle up to drink
Look toward the camera with a satisfied smirk
Keep your gym bag visible in the background

poses.title: The Rack Lean

Lean one elbow on the top rail
Cross your legs at the ankles
Look away from the camera
Keep your physique relaxed but core slightly tucked

bodyLanguage.hands: One on rack, one in pocket

poses.title: The Ab Roller Roll-out
poses.alt: Man using an ab roller for core training

Capture the shot when the body is parallel to the floor
Keep your arms straight

poses.title: The Weight Plate Stack

Sit on top with legs wide apart
Rest your hands on your knees
Look intensely at the lens

poses.title: The Wrist Wrap Adjust

poses.title: The Med Ball Slam

poses.title: The Bench Press Grip

poses.title: The Bicep Peak Flex

Rotate your wrist toward your face

poses.title: The Kettlebell Swing Apex

Maintain a flat back and active hips

poses.title: The Foam Roller Release
poses.alt: Man rolling out his muscles on a foam roller

Support yourself with one arm on the floor
Close your eyes to show the 'relief' or pain
Keep the lighting soft
Focus on the post-workout recovery vibe

poses.title: The Boxing Bag Lean
poses.alt: Man leaning his head against a heavy boxing bag

Rest your forehead against the bag
Keep your boxing gloves on
Let your arms hang by the bag's sides
Capture a moment of silent mental prep

poses.title: The Weighted Pull-up (Back)
poses.alt: Man doing pull-ups with a chain around his neck
steps: Drape a heavy chain around your neck or belt
Perform a pull-up
Capture from the back to show the V-taper
Focus on the metal and skin contrast
Keep your back muscles fully flared

poses.title: The Lat Pulldown Lean
poses.alt: Man pulling down the lat bar in the gym
steps: Sit at the lat pulldown machine
Pull the bar to your upper chest
Lean back slightly to engage the lats
Look up at the cable
Maintain a strong, arched back

poses.title: The Jump Box Step
poses.alt: Man with one foot on a plyo box
steps: Place one foot on a wooden plyo box
Rest your elbow on your knee
Look toward the camera with a sweat-drenched face
Keep your gym shoes clean for the shot
Capture from a low angle to show dominance

poses.title: The Deadlift Lockout
poses.alt: Man standing tall with a heavy barbell
steps: Stand at the top of a deadlift
Pull your shoulders back and chest out
Keep the bar close to your thighs
Maintain an intense, straight-ahead stare
Exhale forcefully for the shot

poses.title: The Shadow Boxing Action
poses.alt: Blurry shot of a man throwing a hook punch
steps: Throw a fast hook punch toward the camera

Keep your guard hand up by your chin
Twist your torso to show core engagement
Focus on the speed of the movement

poses.title: The Towel Around Neck
poses.alt: Man standing with a towel around his neck after gym
steps: Drape a white gym towel around your neck
Hold both ends of the towel with your hands
Look off-camera with a slight smile
Show the 'pump' in your arms

poses.title: The Squat Rack Frame
poses.alt: Man framed inside the metal bars of a power rack

Hold onto the vertical metal poles
Look through the 'frame' of the rack at the camera
Keep your legs slightly apart
Use the symmetry of the rack for the photo

poses.title: The Dip Bar Focus
poses.alt: Man suspended on dip bars
steps: Lock your arms out on the dip bars
Cross your feet behind you
Look down at your chest
Ensure your triceps and chest are flexed
Capture from a 45-degree angle

poses.title: The Side Plank Core
poses.alt: Man performing a side plank on the floor
steps: Prop yourself on one elbow and the side of your foot
Raise your other arm straight into the air
Look up at your raised hand
Keep your hips high and body in a straight line
Capture to show the oblique definition

poses.title: The Leg Press Push
poses.alt: Man's legs pushing the leg press machine
steps: Sit in the leg press machine
Place your feet high on the platform
Hold the side handles firmly
Capture the shot from the side to show leg muscle depth
Keep your head back against the seat

poses.title: The Hand Sanitizer/Grip Prep
poses.alt: Candid shot of man rubbing hands together
steps: Stand in the gym center
Rub your hands together as if preparing for a lift
Look down at your palms
Maintain a slight lean forward
The shot should feel like the start of a session

poses.title: The Wall Ball Catch
poses.alt: Man catching a medicine ball against a wall
steps: Stand near a gym wall with a med ball
Throw the ball up and catch it at face level
Capture mid-catch to see the impact
Keep your feet in a wide squat stance
Focus on the arm positioning

poses.title: The Shoe Tie (Bench)
poses.alt: Man tying his lifting shoes on a gym bench

Lean over to tie your laces
Keep the other foot flat on the floor
Show the gym floor and equipment in the background
Capture the focus on the task

poses.title: The Final Exhaustion
poses.alt: Man lying on the gym floor after a hard session

Spread your arms and legs wide
Close your eyes and breathe deeply

mirror poses.title: mirror Poses
mirror poses.description: Essential and trendy mirror selfie techniques to showcase your style and physique.

poses.title: The Classic Vertical
poses.alt: Boy standing straight in front of a mirror taking a full-length selfie
steps: Stand centered in front of a full-length mirror
Hold your phone at shoulder level with one hand
Tilt the top of the phone slightly forward for a slimmer look
Keep your eyes on the phone screen to avoid a forced gaze
Shift your weight to one leg and slightly bend the other knee

bodyLanguage.hands: Single hand grip at chest height

poses.title: The Look-Away Lean
poses.alt: Boy leaning against a mirror looking away from the phone
steps: Stand sideways to the mirror
Lean one shoulder against the glass
Hold the phone at chest level, tilted slightly toward the mirror
Look away from the mirror toward a light source
Keep your free hand in your pocket

bodyLanguage.hands: Phone in one hand, other hand in pocket

poses.title: The Elevator Check
poses.alt: Man taking a selfie in an elevator mirror
steps: Stand in the corner of the elevator for depth
Hold the phone high (eye level) to capture the full outfit
Look at the phone screen, not the mirror
Slightly bend one knee to break the stiff stance
Use the metallic elevator walls for cool reflections

poses.title: The Flexed Bicep (Gym Mirror)
poses.alt: Man flexing his bicep in a gym mirror selfie
steps: Stand 45 degrees to the mirror
Flex the arm closest to the mirror
Hold the phone with the opposite hand at waist level
Tilt the phone upward to capture muscle peaks
Exhale to make the core appear tighter

bodyLanguage.hands: One hand flexing, one holding phone

poses.title: The Flash Shadow
poses.alt: Mirror selfie with flash on, creating a mystery look
steps: Turn on the camera flash
Hold the phone directly in front of your face
Capture the shot so the flash creates a 'glow' over the lens
Wear a dark outfit to emphasize the shadow
Keep the background dimly lit

poses.title: The Sitting Floor Selfie
poses.alt: Man sitting on the floor in front of a full length mirror
steps: Sit on the floor with one leg bent and one leg extended
Rest the arm holding the phone on your bent knee
Tilt the phone downward
Look down at the phone screen
Ensure your footwear is visible as its a key part of the look

poses.title: The Jawline Tilt
poses.alt: Close up mirror selfie focusing on jawline
steps: Stand close to the bathroom or dressing mirror
Hold the phone at chest level, angled up
Tilt your head back and look toward the mirror edge
Push your tongue to the roof of your mouth to sharpen the jaw
Use side lighting to create shadows under the chin

poses.title: The Phone-over-Eyes
poses.alt: Boy hiding eyes with phone in a mirror selfie
steps: Hold the phone horizontally
Position it so the top edge covers your eyes
Show only your hair and jawline/mouth
Wear a beanie or cap for a more urban vibe
Focus on the 'aesthetic' of the clothes

poses.title: The Gym Rack Reflection
poses.alt: Mirror selfie showing the gym environment in background
steps: Stand between two pieces of gym equipment
Hold the phone at waist height
Capture the full gym environment in the mirror behind you
Wipe the sweat off your forehead but keep the 'pump' visible
Keep your feet wide for a more dominant stance

poses.title: The Half-Face Peek
poses.alt: Mirror selfie with only half the face visible
steps: Stand so one side of your face is blocked by the phone
Look at the mirror with one eye visible over the phone corner
Keep your hair messy for a 'just woke up' vibe
Use a bathroom mirror with soft morning light
Relax your shoulders

poses.title: The Squatting Mirror Shot
poses.alt: Boy squatting in front of a mirror
steps: Drop into a full squat (heels down or up)
Hold the phone between your knees
Point the camera upward
Place your free hand on the floor for balance
Wear sneakers with high visual detail

poses.title: The Back Muscle Check
poses.alt: Man taking mirror selfie of his back muscles
steps: Turn your back to the mirror
Look over your shoulder into the mirror
Hold the phone high and tilt it back toward your shoulder
Flex your lats (spread your back)
Ensure the lighting is behind you to show definition

poses.title: The Suit & Tie Check
poses.alt: Boy in a suit taking a mirror selfie
steps: Stand perfectly upright in a formal suit
Hold the phone at chest level, keeping it steady
Touch your tie or cufflink with your free hand
Look at the mirror, not the phone
Keep the phone horizontal for a wider outfit view

poses.title: The Double Mirror Infinity
poses.alt: Selfie using two mirrors to create an infinity effect
steps: Stand between two parallel mirrors (like in a barbershop)
Angle the phone to catch the infinite reflections
Keep the phone close to your chest
Look directly into the lens of the phone in the reflection
Experiment with the angle to get the most reflections

poses.title: The Abs Check (Shirt Up)
poses.alt: Man lifting shirt slightly for an abs mirror selfie
steps: Use your free hand to bite the edge of your shirt or pull it up
Hold the phone at shoulder height with the other hand
Flex your core and exhale
Look down at your abs in the mirror
Use overhead lighting for maximum shadow depth

bodyLanguage.hands: One holding shirt, one holding phone

poses.title: The Messy Room Aesthetic
poses.alt: Casual mirror selfie in a bedroom
steps: Stand in front of a slightly tilted floor mirror
Wear an oversized t-shirt or hoodie
Keep your hair uncombed and 'natural'
Hold the phone loosely with a tilted angle
Let the background (bed, posters) show for personality

poses.title: The Car Side Mirror
poses.alt: Selfie taken in a car's side wing mirror
steps: Stand outside the car near the side mirror
Focus the camera on the reflection in the wing mirror
Capture your face and a bit of the road background
Ensure the phone isn't blocking the main part of your face
Shoot during 'Golden Hour' for best lighting

poses.title: The Phone-Hide (Full Face)
poses.alt: Hiding the entire face with the phone in mirror
steps: Hold the phone directly in front of your face
Ensure the camera lens is centered
Focus entirely on the outfit and body posture
Place one hand in your pocket and pop one knee

poses.title: The Sunglasses Reflex
poses.alt: Mirror selfie while wearing sunglasses
steps: Wear dark sunglasses in front of the mirror
Look directly at the phones reflection in your glasses
Hold the phone at chin level
Keep a cool, unbothered expression
Ensure the room lighting doesn't hit the lens directly

poses.title: The Hand-on-Mirror Lean
poses.alt: Boy touching the mirror glass during a selfie
steps: Place your free hand's palm flat on the mirror
Lean toward your hand slightly
Hold the phone with the other hand near your hip
Look at the point where your hand touches the glass
This creates a sense of connection with the reflection

bodyLanguage.hands: One on glass, one with phone

poses.title: The Locker Room Champ
poses.alt: Man taking a selfie in a gym locker room
steps: Sit on the locker room bench
Hold the phone between your legs looking up
Keep your gym bag and water bottle in the frame
Capture the post-workout exhaustion
Look down at the phone

poses.title: The Tilted Angle Fit
poses.alt: Mirror selfie with the phone tilted at 45 degrees
steps: Tilt the phone at a sharp angle (diagonal)
Stand with legs crossed at the shins
Look at the phone's top corner
Use this to create a more 'dynamic' and less static photo
Ensure the whole outfit is in the frame

poses.title: The Two-Handed Focus
poses.alt: Boy holding the phone with both hands for a steady selfie
steps: Grip the phone with both hands
Position it right in the center of your chest
Keep your elbows tucked into your sides
Look directly into the mirror reflection of the camera lens
This is the most stable and centered mirror pose

poses.title: The Vintage Mirror Vibe
poses.alt: Selfie in a small, ornate vintage mirror
steps: Find a small wall mirror or a hand mirror
Focus the camera only on the reflection inside the frame
Capture just your eyes or half your face
The 'clutter' around the mirror adds to the aesthetic
Use a warm filter to match the vintage feel

couples.title: Couples Poses

romantic.title: Romantic Poses

Capture the natural movement

poses.title: The Mirror Soul

Reach down and hold hands

poses.title: The Ear Whisper Giggles

poses.title: The Walk Away

fun.title: Fun Poses

poses.title: Jumping Together

poses.title: The Shopping Cart Race

The other partner pushes and runs

poses.title: The Confetti Throw

poses.title: The Water Splash

poses.title: The Chalk Handprint

poses.title: The Bicycle For Two

poses.title: The Tongue Out Selfie

Hold the phone up to capture your faces
Stick out your tongues simultaneously
Lean your heads together so they touch

poses.title: The Umbrella Spin

poses.title: The Balloon Chase

poses.title: The Finger Mustache

poses.title: The Dance Off

wedding.title: Wedding Poses

traditional_couple.title: Traditional Couple Poses

poses.title: The Classic Side-by-Side

The woman can hold her traditional attire or rest a hand on the man's chest

bodyLanguage.hands: Gentle contact, highlighting traditional jewelry or garment details
bodyLanguage.expression: Serene smile or a soft, romantic gaze
bodyLanguage.angle: Front-facing or slightly turned toward each other

poses.title: The Forehead Touch

poses.title: The Dupatta Veil

Requires very steady hands for the shot

poses.title: The Umbrella Walk
poses.alt: Couple walking with a traditional decorated umbrella
steps: Use a traditional, colorful Rajasthani-style umbrella
The man holds the umbrella over both of them
Walk slowly through an old street or fort
The woman holds the man's arm
Look at each other and chat naturally

poses.title: The Flower Shower
poses.alt: Couple being showered with rose petals
steps: Stand close together with eyes closed
Have someone throw rose petals from above
The man wraps his arms around the woman to 'protect' her
Capture the petals mid-air
Use a fast shutter speed

poses.title: The Mirrored Glance
poses.alt: Couple looking at each other through a mirror
steps: The woman sits at a traditional dressing table
The man stands behind her, visible in the mirror
The photographer shoots the reflection
Both make eye contact through the glass
Focus on the frames and the reflection clarity

poses.title: The Sword and Grace
poses.alt: Man holding a ceremonial sword, woman leaning on him
steps: The man holds a 'Talwar' (sword) across his front
The woman stands behind him, resting her chin on his shoulder
Both look fiercely at the camera
Perfect for showing off Rajput or royal heritage
Keep the background architectural

poses.title: The Temple Prayer
poses.alt: Couple with hands folded in prayer
steps: Stand side-by-side facing a shrine or temple
Both fold your hands in a 'Namaste' gesture
Close your eyes and bow your heads slightly
The man can have a stole around his neck
The woman should have her head covered with a dupatta

poses.title: The Seated Whisper
poses.alt: Man whispering into woman's ear while seated
steps: Sit together on the floor (on a rug or carpet)
The man leans in and 'whispers' to the woman
The woman reacts with a shy giggle
Place traditional props like a 'Sitar' or flowers nearby
Keep the composition tight

poses.title: The Fabric Wave
poses.alt: Woman's dupatta flying in the wind with man behind
steps: The woman stands in the foreground, letting her dupatta fly
The man stands in the background, out of focus
The man looks at the woman through the translucent fabric
Use a fan or natural wind for movement
Capture the flow of the colors

poses.title: The Turban Fix
poses.alt: Woman adjusting the man's wedding turban
steps: The man sits or stands still
The woman uses both hands to adjust the jewelry on his turban
The man looks at her face with admiration
Focus on the embroidery of the turban
Keep the background soft

poses.title: The Swing Moment
poses.alt: Couple on a traditional decorated swing (Jhoola)
steps: Sit together on a 'Jhoola' (swing) decorated with marigolds
The man pushes the swing gently with his feet
The woman leans against him
Both look at each other and smile
Capture the motion blur of the flowers

poses.title: The Ring Reveal
poses.alt: Couple showing their engagement rings with ethnic background
steps: Both hold hands in the center of the frame
The woman's hand is on top, showing her ring
Focus the camera on the rings and the henna
The couple remains blurred in the background
Use a colorful 'Lehenga' as the backdrop

poses.title: The Candlelit Night
poses.alt: Couple surrounded by candles in traditional attire
steps: Place dozens of candles or 'diyas' on the floor around the couple
Both sit in the center of the light
Look at each other through the 'sea' of candles
The light should glow on the silk fabric of the outfits
Keep the rest of the room dark

poses.title: The Feet and Anklets
poses.alt: Man putting anklets on the woman's feet
steps: The woman sits on a chair, one foot extended
The man kneels and clips a silver anklet (Payal) onto her ankle
Focus on the jewelry and the man's hands
The woman looks down with a shy gaze
Classic 'old-world' romantic pose

poses.title: The Pheran/Winter Traditional
poses.alt: Couple in Kashmiri traditional Pherans
steps: Both wear matching embroidered 'Pherans'
Stand in a snowy or forest setting
Share a single 'Kangri' (traditional heater) between you
Look at the camera with a cozy smile
Wrap a single shawl around both shoulders

poses.title: The Archway Silhouette
poses.alt: Silhouette of a couple in traditional clothes in a temple arch
steps: Stand inside a historic stone archway
The sun should be behind you, creating a silhouette
Perform a 'dance' pose (man holding woman's waist)
Ensure the traditional headwear (Pagri/Ghoonghat) is visible in profile
Maintain the architectural frame

poses.title: The Ladoo Feed
poses.alt: Couple feeding each other traditional sweets
steps: The woman holds a 'Ladoo' or sweet to the man's mouth
The man does the same for the woman
Look at each other's eyes, not the food
Capture the mid-bite laugh
Great for showcasing festive joy

poses.title: The Henna Comparison
poses.alt: Couple comparing their henna designs
steps: Both show their palms to the camera
The man's henna is usually simpler (initials)
The woman's henna is full and intricate
Lean your heads together in the middle
Smile at the camera

poses.title: The Sitar Serenade
poses.alt: Man playing Sitar while woman listens
steps: The man sits on the floor with a 'Sitar' or 'Tabla'
The woman leans against a pillar, listening
The man looks up at her while playing
Keep the background filled with traditional decor
Focus on the musical strings

poses.title: The Bangle Sound
poses.alt: Man holding the woman's wrist full of bangles
steps: The man holds the woman's wrist gently
The woman's arm is covered in glass bangles (Choora)
The man moves her hand to make the bangles clink
The woman looks at the man and smiles
Close-up on the wrists is essential

poses.title: The Fort Wall Lean
poses.alt: Couple leaning against an ancient fort wall
steps: Find a rough-textured ancient stone wall
Both lean your backs against it
The man keeps his hands behind his back
The woman holds her 'Pallu' against the wind
Look into the distance together

poses.title: The Shadow Mehendi
poses.alt: Shadow of man's hand over woman's henna
steps: Strong sunlight is needed
The man's hand shadow falls perfectly onto the woman's hennaed palm
The shadow should look like it's 'touching' the design
Photograph the palm only
Keep the hand perfectly still

poses.title: The Turban-to-Head Touch
poses.alt: Couple touching their heads together in wedding gear
steps: Both turn to face the camera
Lean your heads in until they touch
The man's turban should overlap slightly with her head jewelry
Smile warmly
This is the perfect 'thank you' card photo

poses.title: The Rangoli Design
poses.alt: Couple making a rangoli on the floor
steps: Both kneel on the floor
The woman adds color to a 'Rangoli' design
The man holds the powder plates for her
Look at each other and laugh over the design
Shoot from a high angle looking down

poses.title: The Shawl Wrap
poses.alt: Man wrapping his heavy shawl around the woman
steps: The man takes off his heavy 'Dosala' or shawl
He wraps it around the woman's shoulders from behind
The woman holds the edges of the shawl and smiles
Look at each other with warmth
Use soft, evening light

poses.title: The Floral Path
poses.alt: Couple walking on a floor covered in marigolds
steps: Cover the floor with thousands of yellow marigolds
The couple walks through them toward the camera
The woman kicks some petals toward the lens
Hold hands and look ahead
Keep the colors vibrant

poses.title: The Jutti Focus
poses.alt: Close up of couple's traditional leather shoes (Juttis)
steps: Both stand side-by-side wearing matching embroidered 'Juttis'
The camera focuses only on the feet and the floor patterns
The man stands straight; the woman stands on her tiptoes
Shows off the bottom details of the ethnic wear
Background should be a traditional rug

poses.title: The Grateful Bow
poses.alt: Couple bowing to parents (off-screen)
steps: Both bend down to touch the feet of someone off-screen
Capture the curve of the traditional garments
Keep the expressions respectful and humble
Use a wide lens to capture the whole scene
A powerful cultural moment

poses.title: The Coin Toss
poses.alt: Couple tossing coins into a holy river
steps: Stand by a river or water body
Both hold a coin in your fingers
Toss it simultaneously into the water
Look at the ripple in the water, not the camera
Keep the background natural and calm

poses.title: The Saree Pallu Tug
poses.alt: Man playfully pulling the woman's saree pallu
steps: The woman walks away slowly
The man catches the end of her saree (Pallu) and pulls gently
The woman looks back with a surprised but happy face
A classic Bollywood-inspired fun moment
Keep the movement light

poses.title: The Tilak Ceremony
poses.alt: Woman applying a red mark to the man's forehead
steps: The woman holds a small plate of vermilion
She uses her thumb to apply a 'Tilak' to the man's forehead
The man closes his eyes in respect
Focus on the finger touching the forehead
Use high-contrast colors

poses.title: The Royal Balcony Silhouette
poses.alt: Couple silhouette against a carved jaali window
steps: Find a 'Jaali' (carved stone screen)
Stand behind it with light coming from the other side
Hold hands and look at each other in profile
The intricate patterns of the stone will reflect on your faces
Requires professional lighting

poses.title: The Hand-Mirror Glimpse
poses.alt: Reflection of a couple in a traditional ornate hand mirror
steps: The woman holds an ornate, traditional hand mirror at chest height
Angle the mirror so the man's reflection is centered in the glass
The photographer should focus strictly on the reflection within the mirror
The woman's actual face remains softly blurred in the background
Maintain a steady hand to avoid motion blur in the reflection

bodyLanguage.expression: Adoring and soft within the reflection
bodyLanguage.angle: Macro focus on the mirror surface

poses.title: The Final Festive Hug
poses.alt: Couple hugging at the end of a traditional event
steps: Both embrace warmly with full-body contact
The man rests his head on the woman's shoulder
The woman closes her eyes and smiles
Background should be lit with festive lights
The perfect emotional end-shot

couple_trip.title: Travel Couple Poses
couple_trip.description: Romantic and adventurous poses for couples exploring the world

poses.title: The Scenic Horizon
poses.alt: Couple standing at a viewpoint looking out at a mountain landscape
steps: Find a beautiful viewpoint or landmark background
Stand side-by-side or with one partner slightly behind
Look away from the camera toward the scenery together
Place an arm around each other's waist or shoulders
Keep the pose relaxed to look like a candid moment

bodyLanguage.hands: Holding hands or arm around waist
bodyLanguage.expression: Awe-struck or peaceful, looking at the view
bodyLanguage.angle: Back view or side profile to emphasize the location

poses.title: The Lead Me To
poses.alt: Woman holding man's hand leading him toward a landmark
steps: One partner stands with their back to the camera, holding the other's hand
The trailing partner is partially in the frame, holding the camera-facing hand
Walk toward a significant landmark or horizon
Keep the arm extended and the grip firm but natural
Ensure the background is centered and grand

poses.title: The Map Check
poses.alt: Couple huddled over a paper map in an old city street
steps: Both hold a physical map or a single phone together
Huddle close, shoulder to shoulder
One partner points at a destination on the map
Look at the map with expressions of curiosity
Capture in a busy street or at a trailhead

poses.title: The Backpack Lean
poses.alt: Couple leaning on their backpacks during a hike
steps: Both wear hiking backpacks and stand facing the camera
One partner leans their back against the other's side
Hold water bottles or trekking poles as props
Smile broadly as if taking a break
Ensure mountain peaks are visible in the background

poses.title: The Rooftop Toast
poses.alt: Couple clinking glasses on a city rooftop at sunset
steps: Sit at a rooftop bar with the city skyline behind you
Clink your glasses together at chest height
Look at each other instead of the camera
Keep your seating posture relaxed
Use the 'golden hour' light for a warm glow

poses.title: The Shoulder Ride
poses.alt: Man carrying woman on his shoulders at a festival
steps: The man lifts the woman onto his shoulders
The woman raises both hands in the air with a 'V' sign
The man holds her legs firmly for balance
Keep the horizon line straight in the background
Best captured in a crowd or open beach

poses.title: The Train Window Dream
poses.alt: Couple looking out a moving train window
steps: Sit opposite each other or side-by-side on a train
Both lean toward the window
One partner rests their head on the others shoulder
Look out at the passing landscape
The camera should be inside the cabin capturing the reflection

poses.title: The Van Life Hangout
poses.alt: Couple sitting in the back of an open camper van
steps: Open the back doors of a camper van parked near water
Sit on the edge with legs dangling out
Drape a blanket over both pairs of shoulders
Hold matching enamel coffee mugs
Look out toward the lake or forest

poses.title: The Local Foodie
poses.alt: Couple trying street food at a night market
steps: Stand in front of a brightly lit street food stall
One partner feeds a small bite to the other
Capture the steam from the food if possible
Smile and make eye contact
Keep the background busy with market lights

poses.title: The Bike Adventure
poses.alt: Couple riding bicycles through a vineyard
steps: Ride bicycles parallel to each other
One partner looks back at the other while pedaling
Keep one hand on the handlebar and wave with the other
Ensure the background shows local flora
Use a wide angle to capture the path

poses.title: The Suitcase Sit
poses.alt: Couple sitting on their suitcases in an airport terminal
steps: Sit on hard-shell suitcases placed side-by-side
Rest your chins on your hands
Look at the airport flight board or out the window
Place passports or tickets visibly in a pocket
Keep the composition symmetrical

poses.title: The Waterfall Kiss
poses.alt: Couple kissing in front of a massive waterfall
steps: Stand on a rock safely in front of the falls
Perform a slight 'dip' or a standing embrace
The waterfall spray should create a misty effect
Wear bright colors to stand out from the dark rocks
Use a fast shutter speed to freeze the water

poses.title: The Beach Run
poses.alt: Couple running along the shoreline holding hands
steps: Run toward the camera along the wet sand
Hold hands and look at each other while running
Capture the splashing water around your feet
Keep clothing light and flowy
Best shot during low tide for reflections

poses.title: The Shadow Walk
poses.alt: Shadow of a couple holding hands on a cobblestone street
steps: Find a street with strong midday sun
Walk away from the sun so your shadows are long
Photograph only the shadows on the ground
Swing your joined hands to create a clear gap
Ensure the texture of the street is clear

poses.title: The Passport Flex
poses.alt: Couple holding their passports toward the camera
steps: Hold both passports together in the center
Keep your faces partially hidden behind the passports
Background should be the airplane wing or terminal
Focus the lens on the passport covers
Wear travel-ready comfortable clothes

poses.title: The Mountain Peak Hug
poses.alt: Couple hugging at the very top of a mountain summit
steps: The man stands behind the woman, arms wrapped around her chest
Both look at the camera with a sense of victory
Place your hiking gear (poles/bags) on the ground nearby
Ensure the vast valley is visible behind you
Wind-swept hair adds to the authenticity

poses.title: The Museum Whisper
poses.alt: Couple looking at a painting and whispering in a gallery
steps: Stand in front of a large piece of art
Both look at the art, with your backs to the camera
One partner leans in to whisper in the other's ear
Keep your hands clasped behind your backs
Maintain a respectful, quiet posture

poses.title: The Scooter Cruise
poses.alt: Couple riding a moped through a tropical island
steps: The man drives the moped; the woman sits behind
The woman wraps her arms around his waist and looks at the camera
Both wear matching helmets
Capture with palm trees or a beach road in the background
Use a slight side angle for depth

poses.title: The Hammock Doze
poses.alt: Couple sharing a single hammock between two trees
steps: Both lie in a wide hammock facing opposite ways
Dangle your feet off the sides
One partner holds a book, the other has eyes closed
Capture from a high angle looking down
Ensure the forest or beach background is visible

poses.title: The City Square Dance
poses.alt: Couple dancing in a cobblestone European square
steps: Find an empty square or plaza at dawn
The man twirls the woman in a dance move
The woman's skirt or dress should flare out
Both look at each other and laugh
Capture the architecture in the background

poses.title: The Cliffside Sit
poses.alt: Couple sitting on the edge of a cliff overlooking the ocean
steps: Sit on a safe ledge with your backs to the camera
Dangle your legs over the edge (carefully)
Lean your heads against each other
Capture a wide shot to emphasize the height and ocean
The vastness of the water should dominate the frame

poses.title: The Desert Wander
poses.alt: Couple walking up a sand dune in the desert
steps: Walk up a steep sand dune, leaving footprints behind
Hold hands and look toward the top of the dune
Wear neutral, light-colored clothing
Capture during 'blue hour' for cool tones
Focus on the texture of the sand

poses.title: The Window Seat Selfie
poses.alt: Couple taking a selfie in an airplane window seat
steps: One partner holds the phone, the other leans in
The airplane window and wing should be in the frame
Both wear eye masks or headphones for a 'traveler' look
Smile at the camera
Use the natural light from the window

poses.title: The Bridge Gaze
poses.alt: Couple standing on a suspension bridge looking at each other
steps: Stand in the middle of a bridge
Lean against the railing together
The lines of the bridge should draw the eye to the couple
One partner touches the other's cheek
Look at each other with a soft gaze

poses.title: The Campfire Cuddle
poses.alt: Couple sitting by a campfire at night
steps: Sit on a log or blanket by a small fire
Wrap a single sleeping bag or blanket around both of you
The fire should be the only light source
Toast a marshmallow together on one stick
Look into the flames

poses.title: The Street Crossing
poses.alt: Couple crossing a busy Shibuya-style intersection
steps: Walk across a zebra crossing during the 'walk' signal
The man carries the woman's shopping bags
Both look at each other and laugh mid-stride
Use a slow shutter speed to blur the background traffic
Stay in the center of the lane

poses.title: The Snowball Fight
poses.alt: Couple playfully throwing snow at each other
steps: Both wear heavy winter coats and gloves
One partner is mid-throw, the other is ducking
Capture the snow particles in the air
Ensure your faces are visible and laughing
Capture against a pine tree background

poses.title: The Boat Bow
poses.alt: Couple standing at the front of a boat on a lake
steps: Stand at the very front (bow) of a small boat
The man holds the woman from the waist
The woman extends her arms to the sides ('Titanic' style)
Capture from another boat or the shore
Ensure the water ripples are visible

poses.title: The Mirror Sunglasses
poses.alt: Couple's reflection in each other's sunglasses
steps: Both wear mirrored aviator sunglasses
Stand very close, nose-to-nose
The camera focuses on the reflection in the lens
The background landmark is visible in the reflection
Keep your faces perfectly still

poses.title: The Road Map Sprawl
poses.alt: Couple laying on the hood of a car with a map
steps: Lay on the hood of your rental car
Spread a large paper map over both of you
Look at each other and point to a random spot
Park the car on a scenic roadside
Shoot from a high angle

poses.title: The Gelato Share
poses.alt: Couple sharing a gelato cone in Italy
steps: Both hold a single ice cream cone
One partner licks the ice cream while the other looks on
Capture in a colorful narrow alleyway
Keep the colors of the ice cream and outfits coordinated
Focus on the faces and the cone

poses.title: The Lighthouse Gaze
poses.alt: Couple standing at the base of a tall lighthouse
steps: Stand at the very bottom of a white lighthouse
Both look up at the top together
Place your hands in your pockets
Use a vertical frame to emphasize the height
Capture with a blue sky background

poses.title: The Cave Silhouette
poses.alt: Silhouette of a couple standing at the mouth of a cave
steps: Stand inside a dark cave looking out toward the light
Hold hands and create a clear space between your bodies
The camera should expose for the bright exterior
Stand in a profile view to show the 'nose-to-nose' gap
Capture the jagged edges of the cave entrance

poses.title: The Souvenir Shop
poses.alt: Couple browsing local handicrafts in a shop
steps: Stand inside a local craft shop
One partner holds up a mask or hat to the other's face
Look at each other and laugh
The shop items should provide a colorful frame
Keep the lighting natural

poses.title: The Plane Wing View
poses.alt: Couple's hands joined against the airplane window
steps: Place both your hands on the airplane window glass
Interlock fingers over the view of the clouds
Focus the camera on the hands and the wing
The cabin should be dark
A symbolic 'leaving on a trip' photo

poses.title: The Jungle Walk
poses.alt: Couple walking through a lush green jungle
steps: Walk away from the camera on a muddy trail
The man hacks away a branch (playfully) with a stick
The woman follows closely behind, looking up at the trees
Wear earthy-toned clothing
Let the greenery overwhelm the frame

poses.title: The Sunset Lean
poses.alt: Couple leaning on a fence watching the sunset
steps: Find a wooden fence or stone wall overlooking the sea
Lean your elbows on the railing
The sun should be between your faces
Keep your posture loose
Look at the horizon

poses.title: The Final Arrival
poses.alt: Couple standing in front of their hotel/resort
steps: Stand in front of the entrance of your final destination
Both throw your arms around each other and the luggage
Look at the camera with a 'we made it' look
Keep the resort signage in the background
The lighting should be bright and welcoming
